title: reflect.Value cannot be used in the playground
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Navigate to http://play.golang.org/p/MXtD5k8t4t and run the code.

What is the expected output?
[no output]

What do you see instead?
prog.go:9: cannot use unsafe.Pointer

Please provide any additional information below.
This is presumable due to the unexported val field in reflect.Value.
